committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to establish the Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor Act

summary.text: Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor Act - Establishes the Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor (the Canal) in the State of Illinois. Authorizes appropriations to the State of Illinois to develop the Canal for public recreational use.

titles.title: Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor Act
A bill to establish the Hennepin Canal National Heritage Corridor in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
